marketplaceDescription: Your trusted marketplace for buying and selling cars across Texas and nearby states.
discoverListings: Discover the newest listings from our community. Find your next ride today!
beTheFirst: Be the first to list your car on CarLynx!
signInToAccount: Sign in to your CarLynx account
pleaseEnterEmailAndPassword: Please enter your email and password.
pleaseEnterValidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
noAccountFoundOrWrongPassword: No account found with this email address or the password is incorrect.
loginFailedCheckCredentials: Login failed. Please check your credentials and try again.
announcement1: CarLynx.us opened its gates in August 2025, bringing a new and trusted way to buy and sell automobiles across Texas and beyond.
announcement2: Currently FREE for all users! Later this year: $5 for private sellers, special dealer packages available. Enjoy zero fees now!
announcement3: Visit our Useful Info section for helpful resources, including VIN checks and vehicle history reports, before making your decision.
nameOnlyLettersAndSpaces: Name can only contain English letters and spaces.
passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 7 characters.
checkEmailConfirmation: Check your email for confirmation link
confirmationEmailSent: We've sent a confirmation email to your address. Please check your inbox and click the link to activate your account.
leaveBlankKeepCurrent: Leave blank to keep current password
failedToUpdateProfile: Failed to update profile. Please try again.
enterEmailForReset: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
checkEmailForReset: Check your email for the password reset link.
sendFailed: Failed to send. Please try again later.
subject: Subject
modelNotAvailableMotorcycles: Model field not available for motorcycles
discoverPerfectCar: Discover the perfect car from our selection of listings
noResultsDescription: We couldn't find any cars matching your search criteria.
createFirstListing: Create your first listing to start selling your vehicle
deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this listing?
passwordUpdated: Password updated successfully! Redirecting to login...
sellYourCarDescription: Sell your car to thousands of potential buyers
descriptionPlaceholder: Describe your car's condition, features, history, etc.
tellBuyersSpecial: Tell buyers what makes your car special
listingNoLongerAvailable: This listing is no longer available.
sellerNoPhotos: The seller hasn't uploaded any photos for this listing
name: Name

registrationSuccessNoId: Registration succeeded, but user ID not found.

managePersonalInfo: Manage your personal information and account settings
leaveEmptyKeepPassword: Leave empty to keep current password
sendResetEmailInfo: We'll send a password reset link to this email
nicbVinCheckDesc: Free VIN check for theft and salvage/total loss from the National Insurance Crime Bureau. Limit: up to 5 requests per day.
txdmvTitleCheckDesc: Title brand, total loss, and salvage check via official NMVTIS providers recommended by TxDMV.
iseecarsVinLookupDesc: Quick free check: estimated market price, recommendations, reviews, and possible title alerts.
agreementIntro: By submitting your listing, you agree that:
agreementVisible: Your listing will be visible to all users
agreementAccuracy: You are responsible for the accuracy of information
acceptTerms: I accept the terms and conditions
startTypingInstructions: Start typing to choose from available cities
selectContactMethod: Select at least one contact method
pleaseSelectContact: Please select at least one contact method.
engineSizeMotorcycle: Engine size must be between 50 and 3000 cc for motorcycles.
invalidEngineSize: Invalid engine size format for cars.
engineSizeCars: Engine size must be between 0.5 and 10.0 liters for cars.
imageFormatsInfo: JPG, PNG or WEBP up to 500KB each
chooseFromDropdownOrType: Choose from dropdown or type manually
pngJpgWebp: PNG, JPG, WEBP up to 500KB each
youCanUploadImages: You can upload up to 4 images (.jpg, .png, .webp, max 500 KB each)
actionCannotBeUndone: This action cannot be undone. Your listing will be permanently removed from the site and will no longer be visible to potential buyers.
permanentlyRemoveFromSite: This will permanently remove your listing from the site
pleaseUploadAtLeastOneImage: Please upload at least one image to save changes.
listingAppearsToBeDealership: ‚ö†Ô∏è Your listing appears to contain language commonly used by dealerships. Carlynx is dedicated exclusively to private sellers. If you are a dealer, please note that listings from dealerships are not permitted. Kindly review and revise your description to ensure it reflects a private sale.
enterValidEngineSizeMotorcycle: Please enter a valid engine size for motorcycles (50cc or more).
onOrMoreImagesTooLarge:
One or more images are too large (max 500 KB each). Please resize or compress your photo.

You can use free tools like:
- https://www.iloveimg.com/compress-image
- https://www.img2go.com/compress-image
- https://www.photopea.com/ (File > Export As > JPG/PNG, set quality/size)
